snippet: In a news conference, President François Hollande said that he was moving decisively to reduce unemployment and defended his relationship with the German chancellor, Angela Merkel.
abstract: French President Francois Hollande says he is moving decisively to reduce unemployment and promote economic growth, and defends his relationship with German Chancellor Angela Merkel.
lead_paragraph: In a news conference, President François Hollande said that he was moving decisively to reduce unemployment and defended his relationship with the German chancellor, Angela Merkel.

headline.seo: François Hollande of France Defends His Record
headline.main: French President Defends Record as Economy Struggles
headline.print_headline: French President Defends Record as Economy Struggles
